nodes.text: The royal auction house[source?] was a building on Zygerria used by the Zygerrian Slave Empire to auction off slaves to the highest bidder.

The 50,000 Togrutan population of Kiros was due to go on auction here but was interrupted by Jedi Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Ahsoka Tano and Clone Captain 
Rex.
